AmazonS3::authenticate ( $  bucket,
$  opt = null,
$  location = null,
$  redirects = 0 
)

Authenticate

Authenticates a connection to S3.

public

Parameters:
string $bucket (Required) The name of the bucket to be used.
array $opt (Optional) Associative array of parameters for authenticating. See the individual methods for allowed keys.
string $location (Do Not Use) Used internally by this function on occasions when S3 returns a redirect code and it needs to call itself recursively.
integer $redirects (Do Not Use) Used internally by this function on occasions when S3 returns a redirect code and it needs to call itself recursively.
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
See also:
http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AmazonS3/2006-03-01/RESTAuthentication.html

Reimplemented from TarzanCore.
